name: Delivery Drive
description:
Traffic laws  won't stop you from making the fastest delivery you can. But be careful and don't crash into other cars!

Made for the 107th Trijam, the theme was "Package Delivery" in 2.5 hours

The camera now follows the player more smoothly, last time I just parented the camera to the player.

You can the find the source code here: https://github.com/Dino-MZ/Delivery-Drive-Trijam107

THINGS I DID NOT MAKE IN THOSE 3 HOURS:

- All 3D assets where made by Quaternius Dev (http://quaternius.com)

- Music by Joshua McLean: https://joshua-mclean.itch.io/music-pack-8

Contains music ©2021 Joshua McLean (https://joshua-mclean.itch.io) Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International
